mapper.update:
update student
studentName = #{studentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
studentTelephone = #{studenttelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
administrativeClass = #{administrativeclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idNumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
studentStatus = #{studentstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
educationalSystem = #{educationalsystem,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
enrollmentDate = #{enrollmentdate,jdbcType=DATE},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where studentId = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update student set studentName = #{studentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studentTelephone = #{studenttelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, college = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, administrativeClass = #{administrativeclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idNumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studentStatus = #{studentstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, educationalSystem = #{educationalsystem,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, enrollmentDate = #{enrollmentdate,jdbcType=DATE}, major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where studentId = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
